import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{// State variables to store form inputs
const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');// useNavigate hook to redirect to a different page

const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();// Prevent the form from refreshing the page

if(response.status===200){// Store the token in localStorage
localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.token);// Clear error message
setError('');// Redirect to the dashboard
navigate('/dashboard');}}catch(error){// Handle error response from the backend
